name: HogwartsHouseCup
0:
”Alexa, launch House Cup”
”Alexa, ask House Cup what are the house standings?”
”Alexa, tell House Cup to add five points to Hufflepuff!”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: house cup
des:
If you love the magical world of Harry Potter you will enjoy Hogwarts House Cup! 
This skill allows you to add or remove points to or from one of the four Hogwarts Houses. 
Great for families and friends that are up for a little friendly competition.
Whether tracking chores or playing games, now you can know which house deserves to hoist the House Cup!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
